EmailTemplate.name: Claim : Untouched by Investigation Queue
EmailTemplate.subject: Claim {!Case.CaseNumber} : Untouched by Investigation Queue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A claim has been untouched by Investigation Queue.
Claim Details :
Case Number : {!Case.CaseNumber} Claim Link : {!Case.Link}.
Kindly take necessary actions.
Best Regards, Comcast Turnpike Support.
